summary: In order to save King Rudolph of Ruritania from assassins and murderous usurpers, the kingdom hires a look-a-like London cabby to impersonate the Monarch.
cast: Peter Sellers|Lynne Frederick|Lionel Jeffries|Elke Sommer|Gregory Sierra|Jeremy Kemp|Catherine Schell|Simon Williams|Stuart Wilson|Norman Rossington|John Laurie|Graham Stark|Michael Balfour|Arthur Howard|Ian Abercrombie|Michael Segal|Harry WÃ¼stenhagen|Erik Cord|Joe Dunne|Frank Gatliff|Dick Geary|Mickey Gilbert|Robert Gillespie|Mike Grady|Larry Holt|John Hudkins|John Moio|Victor Paul|Drina Pavlovic|Gil Perkins|George Robotham|Joe Yrigoyen
title: El estrafalario prisionero de Zenda
